title: ［一人一信］要求聯合國維持和平步隊進駐香港

replies.msg:
睇到8月11日晚嘅警犬
我哋唯有盡力一舖
要求聯合國維和步隊進駐香港


https://peacekeeping.un.org/en/media-contacts

birnbackn@un.org

Dear officer,

Due to humanitarian concerns, we, the Hong Kong people, seek Peacekeeping Force to land Hong Kong to sweep away terroristic Hong Kong Police Force.

Largely peaceful protests continued from 9 June were brutally hunted down by the Hong Kong Police Force. A string of unlawful acts by HKPF, including collaboration with triad gangs, denial of infiltration into the protestors, shooting expired tear gas in indoor area of mass transit systems, hunting down fleeing protestors down the escalators inside train stations, shooting rubber bullet causing blindness in protestors and so on, have threatened the life of innocent Hong Kong people.

Since 9 June, HKPF has shot more than 1800 tear gas in public areas ans over 200 rubber bullets and bean bag round, which hurt not only the protestors but also mostly peaceful citizens who did not engage in any protest. Two of them were shot in the head, causing permanent damage to their vision. The lady being shot in the head yesterday was a volunteer first-aid helper.

Such acts have created mass anger in the public. The unlawful acts of the HKPF have gone unpunished due to the absence of independent legal bodies to restrict the level of arm to be used on people and protestors.

We urge the United Nations to deeply consider sending Peacekeeping Force to disarm the HKPF until a legal body to restrict the power of HKPF is set up and help Hong Kong people to restore peace and order.

Regards,
your name
